Hey, wake up Magic!"},{"lineNumber":46982,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メディウサなんぞどうでもいいと言え！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Say you don't care about Medusa!\""},{"lineNumber":46983,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、マジックさーん！　あ、朝ですよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"M-Magic-san! Oh, it's morning!\""},{"lineNumber":46984,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぅわっはっは。起きないよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wahaha. She's not waking up."},{"lineNumber":46985,"originalJapaneseLine":"　起こした所で、何も変わらない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if you wake her up, nothing will change."},{"lineNumber":46986,"originalJapaneseLine":"　肉体を失う苦痛を、わざわざ感じるだけだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It would only make her feel the pain of losing her body unnecessarily.\""},{"lineNumber":46987,"originalJapaneseLine":"「頼まれてもいないのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even though you weren't asked,"},{"lineNumber":46988,"originalJapaneseLine":"　親しい者や、弱者が苦境に立っている所を","translatedEnglishLine":"you showed the moments when loved ones or the weak are in hardship,"},{"lineNumber":46989,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見せたのであろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"you probably did that, right?\""},{"lineNumber":46990,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そりゃあ、ちょっとしたサービスだよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, that's just a little service.\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Yeah."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まずは、眠って……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, sleep..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふぅん？　……まあ、寝てる間に終わった方が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? ...Well, it might be less painful if it's over while you're asleep,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦しくないかもしれない、わね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so you might not suffer, you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、そうだねえ。さぁ、スリープをかけるよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that's true. Now then, I'll cast sleep."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま、魔法を受け入れて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just accept the magic as it is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテの言葉に導かれるように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if guided by Zakarite's words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは目を伏せて、そのまま意識を失う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic lowered her eyes and lost consciousness just like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （さよなら…………スシヌ……ランス…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Goodbye... I'm dying... Rance...
I love you...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んふふふふ、ふーーーーふふはははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nfufufufu, fuuuu-hufuhahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 堕ちた堕ちた！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's fallen, she's fallen!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この瞬間が、いーっつも堪らない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This moment is always unbearable (in a good way)!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ……さあさあ。魂を頂こう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now... now, now. Let me take your soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夢を見せてあげるよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll show you a dream.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサが死んでみんな助かる……そんな夢だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A dream where Medusa dies and everyone is saved... that's the dream."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうやって、たっぷりと魂を汚す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In that way, the soul is thoroughly tainted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうして奪った魂は自分のものだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soul taken like that becomes mine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まずは何をさせようかと悪魔が思いを馳せた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The devil pondered what to make her do first,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その瞬間。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: at that very moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょーーーーっと待ったーーーーーッッ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Waiiiiiit a miiiiinute!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様参上！　間に合った、か……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've arrived! Made it in time, huh...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだい、お前…………？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Who are you...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわっ。これがザカリテ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa. This is Zakarite?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、マジック……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Magic...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリス！　まさか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis! No way..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ううん、ギリギリセーフよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, just barely safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魂は、まだ取れてない……でしょ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soul hasn't been taken yet... right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おや、同類……まあ、これから取るんだがね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? A kindred spirit... Well, I'm about to take it now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か知らないが、邪魔しないでくれるかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know what you want, but could you not interfere?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「消えろ、ザカリテ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Disappear, Zakarite."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おやおやおや。邪魔をするのかい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh my, oh my, oh my. You're going to interfere?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ使徒の立場からすると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From an apostle's standpoint,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主ではなくとも魔人の肩を持つのかね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even if not the master, you side with a demon, huh."
(...? What did you just say...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これ以上、ゼス王を……パセリの子孫を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No more shall King Zess... nor Parsley’s descendants,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食い物にはさせぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: be made prey."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ざぁんねん。今回も遅かったねぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Too bad. You're late this time again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう契約は成立だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The contract has already been sealed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この娘は、自らの意志で契約の椅子に座った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This girl sat in the contract chair of her own will."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ……フェリス？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch... Felis?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……もしマジックが受け入れてるなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...If Magic has accepted it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 契約は結ばれてるのと同じ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then it's as if the contract has been made...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテを殺しても、解決しないかも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even killing Zakarite might not solve it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-No way..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……こら、起きろマジック！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... Hey, wake up Magic!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサなんぞどうでもいいと言え！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Say you don't care about Medusa!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、マジックさーん！　あ、朝ですよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "M-Magic-san! Oh, it's morning!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぅわっはっは。起きないよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wahaha. She's not waking up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 起こした所で、何も変わらない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if you wake her up, nothing will change.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肉体を失う苦痛を、わざわざ感じるだけだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would only make her feel the pain of losing her body unnecessarily."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「頼まれてもいないのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though you weren't asked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親しい者や、弱者が苦境に立っている所を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you showed the moments when loved ones or the weak are in hardship,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見せたのであろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you probably did that, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そりゃあ、ちょっとしたサービスだよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that's just a little service."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Yeah."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まずは、眠って……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, sleep..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふぅん？　……まあ、寝てる間に終わった方が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? ...Well, it might be less painful if it's over while you're asleep,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦しくないかもしれない、わね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so you might not suffer, you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、そうだねえ。さぁ、スリープをかけるよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that's true. Now then, I'll cast sleep."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま、魔法を受け入れて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just accept the magic as it is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテの言葉に導かれるように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if guided by Zakarite's words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは目を伏せて、そのまま意識を失う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic lowered her eyes and lost consciousness just like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （さよなら…………スシヌ……ランス…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Goodbye... I'm dying... Rance...
I love you...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んふふふふ、ふーーーーふふはははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nfufufufu, fuuuu-hufuhahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 堕ちた堕ちた！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's fallen, she's fallen!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この瞬間が、いーっつも堪らない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This moment is always unbearable (in a good way)!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ……さあさあ。魂を頂こう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now... now, now. Let me take your soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夢を見せてあげるよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll show you a dream.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサが死んでみんな助かる……そんな夢だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A dream where Medusa dies and everyone is saved... that's the dream."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうやって、たっぷりと魂を汚す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In that way, the soul is thoroughly tainted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうして奪った魂は自分のものだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soul taken like that becomes mine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まずは何をさせようかと悪魔が思いを馳せた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The devil pondered what to make her do first,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その瞬間。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: at that very moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょーーーーっと待ったーーーーーッッ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Waiiiiiit a miiiiinute!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様参上！　間に合った、か……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've arrived! Made it in time, huh...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだい、お前…………？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Who are you...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわっ。これがザカリテ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa. This is Zakarite?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、マジック……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Magic...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリス！　まさか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis! No way..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ううん、ギリギリセーフよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, just barely safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魂は、まだ取れてない……でしょ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soul hasn't been taken yet... right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おや、同類……まあ、これから取るんだがね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? A kindred spirit... Well, I'm about to take it now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か知らないが、邪魔しないでくれるかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know what you want, but could you not interfere?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「消えろ、ザカリテ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Disappear, Zakarite."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おやおやおや。邪魔をするのかい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh my, oh my, oh my. You're going to interfere?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ使徒の立場からすると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From an apostle's standpoint,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主ではなくとも魔人の肩を持つのかね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even if not the master, you side with a demon, huh."
(...? What did you just say...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これ以上、ゼス王を……パセリの子孫を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No more shall King Zess... nor Parsley’s descendants,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食い物にはさせぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: be made prey."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ざぁんねん。今回も遅かったねぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Too bad. You're late this time again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう契約は成立だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The contract has already been sealed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この娘は、自らの意志で契約の椅子に座った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This girl sat in the contract chair of her own will."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ……フェリス？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch... Felis?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……もしマジックが受け入れてるなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...If Magic has accepted it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 契約は結ばれてるのと同じ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then it's as if the contract has been made...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテを殺しても、解決しないかも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even killing Zakarite might not solve it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-No way..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……こら、起きろマジック！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... Hey, wake up Magic!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサなんぞどうでもいいと言え！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Say you don't care about Medusa!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、マジックさーん！　あ、朝ですよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "M-Magic-san! Oh, it's morning!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぅわっはっは。起きないよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wahaha. She's not waking up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 起こした所で、何も変わらない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if you wake her up, nothing will change.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肉体を失う苦痛を、わざわざ感じるだけだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would only make her feel the pain of losing her body unnecessarily."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「頼まれてもいないのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though you weren't asked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親しい者や、弱者が苦境に立っている所を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you showed the moments when loved ones or the weak are in hardship,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見せたのであろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you probably did that, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そりゃあ、ちょっとしたサービスだよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that's just a little service."
